div.p:
Everything you need for your quantitative study analysis and visualization.
Choose the most suitable option and calculate your price

div.style: width: 205px;
transform: translate3d(-50%, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d; display: none;
width: 205px;
transform: translate3d(-50%, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d; display: none;
transform: translate3d(-50%, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d; display: none;
transform: translate3d(-50%, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d; display: none;

div.div: Detailed commercial and technical conditions are agreed separately according to the customer's requirements
Max. number of variables in a survey
Export to PowerPoint, Excel, PDF, PNG, JPG
Retail, ad contact, aggregated data specific statistics
Granular access management of users and data
Cleaning and coding of titles and open-ended questions
API for integration with BI systems
Resolution of critical issues within 2 business days

The Correspondence Analysis (CA) module is used to explore relationships between multiple categorical variables. It transforms multifaceted data into a simple graphical representation with the ability to export as a chart, part of a dashboard, or a presentation

div.style: transform: translate3d(-46.825%, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d; display: none; will-change: transform;

div.div: The AI-assisted Reporting (AIR) module is used to convert a templated summary into natural text

div.style: transform: translate3d(-46.825%, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d; display: none; will-change: transform;

div.div: The Text Refiner (TR) module is used to code open-ended questions and create dictionaries

div.style: transform: translate3d(-46.825%, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d; display: none; will-change: transform;

div.div: The Reach&Frequency Analysis (R&F) module is used to analyze the measurements of the total audience in television and print. It uses Reach (the estimated number of people or households exposed to a given medium at a given point in time) and Frequency (the number of times viewers are exposed to the same Ad during a campaign)

div.style: transform: translate3d(-46.825%, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d; display: none; will-change: transform;

div.div: The Publication (PUB) module is used to create separate charts intended for embedding into third-party sources (e.g. websites, research spaces etc.) The charts are linked to the database and can be easily updated with the new data

div.style: transform: translate3d(-46.825%, 0px, 0px) scale3d(1, 1, 1) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg) rotateZ(0deg) skew(0deg, 0deg); transform-style: preserve-3d; display: none; will-change: transform;

div.p:
Everything you need for your quantitative study analysis and visualization.
Choose the most suitable option and calculate your price
